ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Industrial Age
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.17.0 Adds new furniture and appliances to your game from the time period of the late 1800's and early 1900s themed after the industrial era of H.P. Lovecraft's writings.
Adds the following objects: *Refrigerator *Typewriter *Gramophone *Candelabra *Chandelier *Street Gas Lamp *Interior Gas Lamp *Wood Stove Furnace
Special thanks to Vendan for a refrigeration subclass. Check out his mod, RimFridge!
Adds the following resources: *Wax (Obtained from meat at cooking tables)
